main.shareResultText: Ready to embark on a journey through inDrive's history?

intro.text:
Hi!

Are you ready to embark on a journey through inDrive's history? A delightful surprise awaits you at the end of the game!

questions.text: In which city did the inDrive story begin?

feedback.correct: That's right! The inDrive story began in Yakutsk, one of the coldest cities in the world.
feedback.incorrect: You're getting warm! In fact, it's Yakutsk. inDrive was born as a response to injustice. One day on New Year's Eve, in the coldest time of the year, local transportation companies doubled their rates, putting citizens in a difficult position. This is how inDrive appeared. The app where everyone can get a ride at a fair price.

questions.text: In 2014, inDrive reached a new level and appeared in one more country. Can you guess which one?

feedback.correct: That's right, it was Kazakhstan! And 4 years later, we entered the Central and South American market.
feedback.incorrect: It was Kazakhstan. And just 4 years later, we entered the Central and South American market.

questions.text: What do you think, which of these cities has inDrive?

feedback.correct: That’s right, it’s Uberlândia! If you ever find yourself in this lovely Brazilian city, know that you can always negotiate the price of your ride there.
feedback.incorrect: It’s Uberlândia! Yes, it’s a real city in Brazil. Gettsburg and Bolt-York are our inventions.

questions.text: What do you think, how many cities inDrive covers?

feedback.correct: You got it, 749! But we always strive for more!
feedback.incorrect: Oops, wrong answer! inDrive is present in 749 cities as of now. But of course, we have huge plans.

questions.text: What’s the difference between inDrive and similar apps?
options: You can negotiate the price in inDrive
You can choose a driver by their zodiac sign in inDrive
You can order a helicopter in inDrive
questions.correctAnswer: You can negotiate the price in inDrive

feedback.correct: That's right! A fair price for a ride is the main difference between inDrive and other apps.
feedback.incorrect: First and foremost, we are for social justice. That's why you can always negotiate a price in inDrive.

options: To introduce all drivers and riders in cities
To teach all passengers not to slam the door

feedback.correct: You are right on point! We strive to create equal and fair opportunities for people and communities around the world to thrive. Looks like you share our values.
feedback.incorrect: inDrive's main mission is to challenge injustice. People and communities around the world should have equal and fair opportunities to thrive.

questions.text: In April 2021, inDrive received the fairy startup status. What is this status called?

feedback.correct: You are right on point! We strive to create equal and fair opportunities for people and communities around the world to thrive.
feedback.incorrect: No fairy tales, we're serious here! In 2021, inDrive received unicorn status — a company whose market valuation exceeds $1 billion.

questions.text: inDrive supports many different social initiatives. Which is not what inDrive does?
options: Educational projects for teenagers and sports sections
Organizing local parties for users around the world
questions.correctAnswer: Organizing local parties for users around the world

feedback.correct: Great job! Yes, we support various social initiatives through our inVision hub: educational projects for teenagers, different sports sections, startups, and even a film festival.
feedback.incorrect: Not this time! To amplify our impact, we’ve created an inVision hub where we tackle the unfair distribution of resources in education, creative industries, startups, and sports, supporting low-income groups. But we haven’t thrown any parties yet.

questions.text: What are some of the most unusual items, or even animals, that have ever been left in inDrive cars?
options: A case with $1,000,000, an opossum, and a collector's edition of comic books
Toothpaste, a crystal ball, the World Cup
2 wedding dresses on the same day, dentures, a real duck
questions.correctAnswer: 2 wedding dresses on the same day, dentures, a real duck

feedback.correct: You guessed it! inDrive’s passengers sometimes leave behind the most unexpected things in cars, and once, someone even forgot a live duck!
feedback.incorrect: You're even close! inDrive’s passengers have forgotten dentures, a real duck, and even 2 wedding dresses in one day. Can you imagine the drivers’ faces when they found all that?

questions.text: One day inDrive celebrated 200 million rides worldwide. When did this happen?

feedback.correct: You're absolutely right! And now there are even more trips!
feedback.incorrect: It happened in November 2023. 200,000,000 rides, can you imagine?

questions.text: One day, we celebrated 200 million trips worldwide. When did it happen?

feedback.correct: Ha-ha! Yes, it was Spider-Man! Do you know the story? Once a granny met a guy dressed as Spider-Man in inDrive. That ride must have been unforgettably funny!
feedback.incorrect: You were so close! It was… Spider-Man! Once, on an intercity trip, a granny got an unexpected fellow traveler — a passenger in Spider-Man’s costume. There’s even a video of it somewhere on the Internet!

results.9-11: Experienced adventurer. You're great at navigating and can solve even the most difficult puzzle.
results.6-8: Brave adventurer. Always ready for new discoveries and not afraid to experiment.
results.2-5: Young traveler with all roads open to you. Fly with the wind, all the most wonderful things are ahead!
results.0-1: Hmm... Thought you could fool us? We're sure you know a lot about inDrive. Want to try again?
